AD_LootButlerOrin.synopsis: Dark Urge comments on looting Orin's Butler
AD_LootButlerOrin.how_to_trigger: Loot Orin' Butler with the DU nearby.

AD_ChosenRoom.how_to_trigger: With Dark Urge, enter Orin's Chambers (S_ORI_DarkUrge_VB_ChosenRoom_b3d6a7f1-f99b-4c10-98d7-c72017005aa9)

AD_LootButlerOrin_0.text: Orin's own Butler. Isn't it meant to be undying?

AD_ChosenRoom_0.text: Bhaal below, this could be my old chamber...
